DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Vardenafil Subjects With Erectile Dysfunction Diabetes , Hypertension Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 year old Males erectile dysfunction Stable heterosexual relationship Medical history / diagnosis diabetes mellitus and/or hypertension and/or hyperlipidemia Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate use Other exclusion criterion apply accord Summary Product Characteristics
